name: Redcap (ruin13)
description:
Redcap is a boss rush-styled action game set in a weird apocalyptic-fantasy world where you play as a goblin bounty hunter who freshly arrived at the frontier, where she must face several colorful characters in combat.

Art & Design by EzzyDraws

Made for Boss Rush Jam 2023

CONTROLS

WASD - Movement

Left Click - Shoot 

Right Click - Dash

F - Interact

Esc - Pause
